label: uncl4295
comment: Code specifying the reason for a change.

values.label: Member attribute change
values.comment: An attribute of a member of a group has changed.

values.label: Abroad
values.comment: In an other country.

values.label: Member category change
values.comment: The member or benefits category has changed.

values.label: Death
values.comment: Subject has died.

values.label: Disability
values.comment: Subject is disabled.

values.label: Early retirement
values.comment: Retirement before the normal retirement age.

values.label: Hardship
values.comment: Subject is incurring hardship.

values.label: Ill health
values.comment: Subject has ill health.

values.label: Leaving employer
values.comment: Subject is leaving employer.

values.label: Leaving industry
values.comment: Person is leaving, or has left, an identified industry.

values.label: Level/rate table change
values.comment: The insurance level/rate table has changed.

values.label: Normal retirement
values.comment: Subject has retired at the normal retirement age.

values.label: Other
values.comment: Reason differs from any of the other coded values.

values.label: Retrenchment
values.comment: Subject has been retrenched from work.

values.label: Resignation
values.comment: Subject has resigned from work.

values.label: Member status change
values.comment: The member status has changed.

values.label: Alternate quantity and unit of measurement
values.comment: Change is due to an alternate quantity and unit of measurement.

values.label: Article out of assortment for particular company
values.comment: Item normally part of a suppliers standard assortment but is unavailable for a specific buyer due to legal or commercial reasons.

values.label: Article out of assortment
values.comment: Article normally part of a standard assortment is unavailable.

values.label: Item not ordered
values.comment: Code indicating the item or product was not ordered.

values.label: No delivery due to outstanding payments
values.comment: Delivery of an item was stopped due to outstanding deliveries which have not yet been paid.

values.label: Out of inventory
values.comment: Item is out of inventory.

values.label: Quantity adjustment
values.comment: Code indicating that the reason for the quantity variance is because of adjustments.

values.label: National pricing authority agreement is final
values.comment: Code to indicate that the national pricing authority agreement for a price is final.

values.label: Sale location different
values.comment: Sold in a different sales location.

values.label: Best before date out of sequence
values.comment: Goods have a best before date that is earlier than that of goods previously received.

values.label: Damaged goods
values.comment: A change resulting from damaged goods.

values.label: Transport means technical failure
values.comment: Transport means had a technical failure, e.g. transport means could not be unloaded or did not comply with hygienic requirements.

values.label: Equipment technical failure
values.comment: Equipment had a technical failure, e.g. equipment was damaged or wrong.

values.label: Blueprint deviation
values.comment: Change is due to a deviation in the blueprint.

values.label: Goods technical failure
values.comment: Goods had a technical failure, e.g. instability, overhang, transportation lock or damage.

values.label: Spoilage of goods
values.comment: A change resulting from the spoilage of goods.

values.label: Grade difference out of tolerance level
values.comment: The change is due to a variation in the grade of the product outside the tolerance level allowed in an agreement.

values.label: Batch number difference
values.comment: The batch number printed on the product received is different to the batch number specified in the despatch advice message.

values.label: Expiry date difference
values.comment: The expiry date printed on the product received is different from the expiry date specified in the despatch advice message.

values.label: Item identification code unknown
values.comment: The identification code of the item is unknown.

values.label: Barcode not readable
values.comment: Barcode is not readable by a barcode scanning device, e.g. poor print quality.

values.label: Item represents substitution from original order
values.comment: Code indicating the item or product is a substitute of the item or product originally ordered.

values.label: Minimum/maximum product durability date unacceptable
values.comment: Code indicating that the minimum durability date (e.g. best before date) and/or maximum durability date (e.g. expiry date) of a product are not acceptable.

values.label: Temperature outside agreed range
values.comment: The temperature is or has been outside the agreed range.

values.label: Delivered but not advised
values.comment: Shipment or goods have been delivered without any advance notification of delivery.

values.label: Short shipped
values.comment: The quantity of goods received is smaller than advised.

values.label: Balancing quantity
values.comment: Amount needed to resolve difference between ordered and delivered quantity.

values.label: Item withdrawn
values.comment: The item has been withdrawn.

values.label: SSCC difference
values.comment: The logistic unit is identified by another Serial Shipping Container Code (SSCC) than the one announced in the despatch advice.

values.label: SSCC missing
values.comment: The logistic unit is missing its Serial Shipping Container code (SSCC).

values.label: Best before date(s) difference
values.comment: The best before date(s) deviate(s) from those announced in the despatch advice.

values.label: Weight difference
values.comment: More or less weight was received than announced in the despatch advice.

values.label: Quantity difference
values.comment: More or less units were received than announced in the despatch advice.

values.label: Delivered too late
values.comment: Delivered but at a later date than the delivery date under the agreed conditions or stipulated in the preceding message.

values.label: Date change
values.comment: Date has changed.

values.label: Estimated quantity
values.comment: The estimated quantity has changed.

values.label: Gross volume per pack and unit of measure
values.comment: The gross volume per pack and unit of measure has changed.

values.label: Gross weight per pack
values.comment: The gross weight per pack has changed.

values.label: Length difference
values.comment: The change is due to a difference in length.

values.label: Pack/size measure difference
values.comment: The change is due to a difference in pack/size measure.

values.label: Pack type difference
values.comment: The reason for the variation is due to a difference in the type of pack.

values.label: Pack dimension difference
values.comment: The change is due to a difference in the dimension.

values.label: Pack quantity
values.comment: The pack quantity has changed.

values.label: Product/services ID change
values.comment: The product/services identification has changed.

values.label: Pack weight difference
values.comment: The change is due to a difference in the pack weight.

values.label: Pack size difference
values.comment: The reason for the variation is due to a difference in the size of pack.

values.label: Quantity ordered
values.comment: The quantity ordered has changed.

values.label: Quantity based on price qualifier
values.comment: The quantity based on price qualifier has changed.

values.label: Quantity price break
values.comment: The quantity price break has changed.

values.label: Size difference
values.comment: The change is due to a difference in the size.

values.label: Unit of measure difference
values.comment: The change is due to a difference in the unit of measure.

values.label: Unit price
values.comment: The unit price has changed.

values.label: Width difference
values.comment: The change is due to a difference in width.

values.label: Weight qualifier/gross weight per package
values.comment: The weight qualifier/gross weight per package has changed.

values.label: Inadvertent error
values.comment: An inadvertent error in recording a quantity.

values.label: Over shipped
values.comment: A shipped quantity greater than the ordered or invoiced quantity.

values.label: Temporarily unavailable
values.comment: Product is temporarily unavailable.

values.label: Government action
values.comment: Due to government action.

values.label: Excluded from the promotion activity
values.comment: Product is not included in the promotion activity.

values.label: Committed purchase quantity exceeded
values.comment: The committed purchase quantity has been exceeded.

values.label: Committed purchase quantity not ordered
values.comment: The committed purchase quantity has not been ordered.

values.label: Mutually defined
values.comment: A code assigned within a code list to be used on an interim basis and as defined among trading partners until a precise code can be assigned to the code list.
